title: Yoink just got faster and gained an enhanced Clipboard Monitor
content:
Yoink, a popular drag-and-drop app, launched version 2.4.1 today. The update brings noteworthy improvements to the Clipboard Monitor and loading times. 

more…

The post Yoink just got faster and gained an enhanced Clipboard Monitor appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Yoink, a popular drag-and-drop app for Mac, launched version 2.4.1 today. The update brings noteworthy improvements to the Clipboard Monitor.
